attributes.action: enforce current law(s) prohibiting motor vehicles from partially or fully parking on pavements are enforced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a wheelchair user, my mobility has been gradually restricted over recent years by car / van drivers parking partially (2 wheels) or all 4 wheels on pavements. This is illegal but is allowed to continue. Not only does it limit the movements of wheelchair users and visually impaired people, but poses danger to parents with prams. It can also damage pavements and limit emergency services access to houses.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "enforce current law(s) prohibiting motor vehicles from partially or fully parking on pavements are enforced."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14987.asp
